sentences.sContent: So far, what scanty evidence we have points to two suspects.
sentences.sCn: 目前，我们指向两名嫌犯的证据太少。

synos.tran: 缺乏的；吝啬的；仅有的；稀疏的

words.tran: 不足的；缺乏的；勉强够的
缺乏地；吝啬地；不充足地

trans.tranCn: 缺乏的；吝啬的；仅有的；稀疏的
trans.tranOther: You describe something as scanty when there is less of it than you think there should be
